scripts.qa:open: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const path=require('path'); const fs=require('fs'); const file=path.join(__dirname,'docs','QA-CHECKLIST.md'); if(!fs.existsSync(file)){console.error('QA checklist not found at', file); process.exit(1);} const platform=process.platform; let opened=false; try { if(platform==='win32'){ const result=spawnSync('cmd.exe',['/c','start','', file],{stdio:'ignore'}); opened=result.status===0; } else if(platform==='darwin'){ const result=spawnSync('open',[file],{stdio:'ignore'}); opened=result.status===0; } else { const result=spawnSync('xdg-open',[file],{stdio:'ignore'}); opened=result.status===0; } } catch (err) {} if(!opened){ console.log(file); }"
